citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_b62c3aaa-c3b8-41cb-b035-4da16209f26a\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Wiley\", \"family\": \"Evans\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"07\", \"23\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Cet ensemble de donn\u00e9es comprend des mesures continues \u00e0 la surface de la mer de la pression partielle de dioxyde de carbone (pCO2), de la temp\u00e9rature de surface de la mer et de la salinit\u00e9 recueillies \u00e0 partir de la station de terrain sur l'\u00eele Quadra de l'Institut Hakai dans la baie de Hyacinthe en Colombie-Britannique au Canada de 2014-12-19 \u00e0 2019-12- 31. L'\u00eele Quadra, \u00e0 l'extr\u00e9mit\u00e9 nord de la mer des Salish, est un site de mesure c\u00f4ti\u00e8re et \u00e0 haute r\u00e9solution de la teneur en CO2 de l'eau de mer de surface depuis d\u00e9cembre 2014. Les mesures de la temp\u00e9rature in situ, de la salinit\u00e9 et de la pression partielle de CO2 sont effectu\u00e9es en continu sur de l'eau de mer pr\u00e9lev\u00e9e sur une ligne d'\u00e9chantillonnage avec une prise \u00e0 50 m de la rive et \u00e0 une profondeur de 1 m dans la baie Hyacinthe du c\u00f4t\u00e9 est de l'\u00eele Quadra. Les efforts de collecte de ces donn\u00e9es fait partie de la directive de l\u2019Institut Hakai visant \u00e0 faire progresser la compr\u00e9hension du cycle du carbone dans les zones c\u00f4ti\u00e8res du nord-est du Pacifique, en mettant particuli\u00e8rement l\u2019accent sur l\u2019acidification des oc\u00e9ans.\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Enregistrement provisoire en temps r\u00e9el et \u00e0 haute r\u00e9solution de la teneur en dioxyde de carbone (CO2) de l'eau de mer de surface recueillie \u00e0 la station de terrain de l'\u00eele Quadra Island de Hakai Institute \u00e0 Hyacinthe Bay, Colombie-Britannique, Canada\", \"version\": \"1\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.hakai.org/dataset/ca-cioos_b62c3aaa-c3b8-41cb-b035-4da16209f26a?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_b62c3aaa-c3b8-41cb-b035-4da16209f26a\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Wiley\", \"family\": \"Evans\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"07\", \"23\"]}], \"abstract\": \"This dataset includes continuous sea surface measurements of partial pressure of carbon dioxide (pCO2), sea surface temperature and salinity collected from Hakai Institute Quadra Island Field Station in Hyacinthe Bay, British Columbia, Canada. Quadra Island, at the northern terminus of the Salish Sea, has been a site for shore-based and high-resolution measurement of surface seawater CO2 content since December 2014. Measurements of in situ temperature, salinity, and CO2 partial pressure are made near-continuously on seawater drawn from a sample line with an intake 50 m from shore and a depth of 1 m in Hyacinthe Bay on the eastern side of Quadra Island. The effort to collect these data are part of the Hakai Institute's directive to advance the understanding of carbon cycling in northeast Pacific coastal settings with specific emphasis on ocean acidification.\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Real-Time Provisional High-Resolution Record of Surface Seawater Carbon Dioxide (CO2) Content Collected from Hakai Institute Quadra Island Field Station in Hyacinthe Bay, British Columbia, Canada\", \"version\": \"1\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.hakai.org/dataset/ca-cioos_b62c3aaa-c3b8-41cb-b035-4da16209f26a?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>This dataset includes continuous sea surface measurements of partial pressure of carbon dioxide (pCO2), sea surface temperature and salinity collected from Hakai Institute Quadra Island Field Station in Hyacinthe Bay, British Columbia, Canada. Quadra Island, at the northern terminus of the Salish Sea, has been a site for shore-based and high-resolution measurement of surface seawater CO2 content since December 2014. Measurements of in situ temperature, salinity, and CO2 partial pressure are made near-continuously on seawater drawn from a sample line with an intake 50 m from shore and a depth of 1 m in Hyacinthe Bay on the eastern side of Quadra Island. The effort to collect these data are part of the Hakai Institute's directive to advance the understanding of carbon cycling in northeast Pacific coastal settings with specific emphasis on ocean acidification.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup xlink:href="https://cioos.ca/translation_method" xlink:role="translation" xlink:title="text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit  l'aide du service de traduction Amazon">
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="#fr">Cet ensemble de donnes comprend des mesures continues  la surface de la mer de la pression partielle de dioxyde de carbone (pCO2), de la temprature de surface de la mer et de la salinit recueillies  partir de la station de terrain sur l'le Quadra de l'Institut Hakai dans la baie de Hyacinthe en Colombie-Britannique au Canada de 2014-12-19  2019-12- 31. L'le Quadra,  l'extrmit nord de la mer des Salish, est un site de mesure ctire et  haute rsolution de la teneur en CO2 de l'eau de mer de surface depuis dcembre 2014. Les mesures de la temprature in situ, de la salinit et de la pression partielle de CO2 sont effectues en continu sur de l'eau de mer prleve sur une ligne d'chantillonnage avec une prise  50 m de la rive et  une profondeur de 1 m dans la baie Hyacinthe du ct est de l'le Quadra. Les efforts de collecte de ces donnes fait partie de la directive de lInstitut Hakai visant  faire progresser la comprhension du cycle du carbone dans les zones ctires du nord-est du Pacifique, en mettant particulirement laccent sur lacidification des ocans.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>

name: ca-cioos_b62c3aaa-c3b8-41cb-b035-4da16209f26a
notes: This dataset includes continuous sea surface measurements of partial pressure of carbon dioxide (pCO2), sea surface temperature and salinity collected from Hakai Institute Quadra Island Field Station in Hyacinthe Bay, British Columbia, Canada. Quadra Island, at the northern terminus of the Salish Sea, has been a site for shore-based and high-resolution measurement of surface seawater CO2 content since December 2014. Measurements of in situ temperature, salinity, and CO2 partial pressure are made near-continuously on seawater drawn from a sample line with an intake 50 m from shore and a depth of 1 m in Hyacinthe Bay on the eastern side of Quadra Island. The effort to collect these data are part of the Hakai Institute's directive to advance the understanding of carbon cycling in northeast Pacific coastal settings with specific emphasis on ocean acidification.

notes_translated.en: This dataset includes continuous sea surface measurements of partial pressure of carbon dioxide (pCO2), sea surface temperature and salinity collected from Hakai Institute Quadra Island Field Station in Hyacinthe Bay, British Columbia, Canada. Quadra Island, at the northern terminus of the Salish Sea, has been a site for shore-based and high-resolution measurement of surface seawater CO2 content since December 2014. Measurements of in situ temperature, salinity, and CO2 partial pressure are made near-continuously on seawater drawn from a sample line with an intake 50 m from shore and a depth of 1 m in Hyacinthe Bay on the eastern side of Quadra Island. The effort to collect these data are part of the Hakai Institute's directive to advance the understanding of carbon cycling in northeast Pacific coastal settings with specific emphasis on ocean acidification.
notes_translated.fr: Cet ensemble de donnes comprend des mesures continues  la surface de la mer de la pression partielle de dioxyde de carbone (pCO2), de la temprature de surface de la mer et de la salinit recueillies  partir de la station de terrain sur l'le Quadra de l'Institut Hakai dans la baie de Hyacinthe en Colombie-Britannique au Canada de 2014-12-19  2019-12- 31. L'le Quadra,  l'extrmit nord de la mer des Salish, est un site de mesure ctire et  haute rsolution de la teneur en CO2 de l'eau de mer de surface depuis dcembre 2014. Les mesures de la temprature in situ, de la salinit et de la pression partielle de CO2 sont effectues en continu sur de l'eau de mer prleve sur une ligne d'chantillonnage avec une prise  50 m de la rive et  une profondeur de 1 m dans la baie Hyacinthe du ct est de l'le Quadra. Les efforts de collecte de ces donnes fait partie de la directive de lInstitut Hakai visant  faire progresser la comprhension du cycle du carbone dans les zones ctires du nord-est du Pacifique, en mettant particulirement laccent sur lacidification des ocans.
